segments.text: I'm watching this indoor kitchen drawing and it's full of little disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the sink edge in a big sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands there drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be wet soon from that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked too; what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that two-step stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate like he's trying to hide what he's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so precarious; he could tumble down any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm up, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating like little thieves in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light from the tidy garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how normal everything seems from the yard view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the hazards are piling up fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
